Factsheet

Developer:
Lost & Found
Based in Oslo
Release date:
January 2024
Platforms:
Steam
Itch.io
Regular Price:
FREE

Description

Myrin shares a mysterious bond to an ancient artifact, giving them the powers to traverse and reveal secrets in the minimalistic mist-filled world “The Divide”. Using the bond, they must solve puzzles and avoid unnamed fears, to finally reach the Observatory looming in the distance that might hold the answers they seek.

History

Lost & Found Games share a vision of transparency and including game development, challenging but respecting each other's opinions. Through a combination of love for mystery and thrillers, hate for jumpscares, an obsession on fog and a love for “multiple solutions” gameplay, the idea for “MIST: Below” came together.

Features

  • Trail to new locations by throwing out the artifact “The Axiom” and let it pull you towards it
  • Avoid the mysterious remnants of the previous villagers as they will devour you with fear
  • Use your intellect and The Axiom to solve various puzzles
  • Reveal hidden objects and passages by using The Axiom
  • Gain complete control over your connection to The Axiom, and use it to pull or move objects
  • Gain an insight into how the long lost villagers used to live
  • Avoid lurking dangers in the toxic swamp
  • Explore the laboratory village in the ashlands
  • Gain a new friend and discover the only way to stop the mist from devouring everything

About Lost & Found

Boilerplate
Lost & Found games is a Norwegian indie-studio driven by five third-year bachelor students with a passion for games and game development.
